Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Los Angeles to San Diego on 2/2/1988 (Going to SD: P Alejandro Pena, 1B Jeff Conine. Going to LAD: P Mike Walters)...
Traded from San Diego to New York (M) on 2/6/1990 (Going to SD: P Bryan Harvey, P Alejandro Pena, P Roger Salkeld. Going to NYM: P Bob Milacki, 1B Jeff Conine, LF Ray Lankford)...
Injured on 5/23/1991 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Traded from New York (M) to Philadelphia on 6/2/1991 (Going to PHI: P Chad Ogea, RF Jeff Conine. Going to NYM: P Scott Garrelts)...
